xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
activeDirectory.error.missingLdapService=Active Directory service is not available. Please verify your installation. activeDirectory.warning.ldapAuthenticationIsNotEnabled=The system could not connect to Active Directory server because the LDAP authentication service is not enabled. Edit the ##{0}## file and add the following lines, then restart the wiki: activeDirectory.aDGroup.placehoder=Active Directory group activeDirectory.xWikiGroup.placeholder=XWiki group activeDirectory.aDUserField.placeholder=Active Directory user field activeDirectory.xWikiUserProperty.placeholder=XWiki user property activeDirectory.resetGroupCache.submit=Reset group cache activeDirectory.save.submit=Save activeDirectory.connectionSettings.title=Connection settings activeDirectory.configuration.title=Configuration activeDirectory.miscellaneous.title=Miscellaneous activeDirectory.resetGroupCacheSuccess=Groups cache has been reseted. activeDirectory.newEntry.title=New Entry
activeDirectory.ldap.label=Enable the Active Directory authentification activeDirectory.ldap.hint=Enable the Active Directory authentication for this wiki. If enabled and configured properly, a local user will be created whenever an Active Directory user visit this wiki for the first time. The default is 'yes'. activeDirectory.ldap_server.label=Active Directory server address activeDirectory.ldap_server.hint=The default is '127.0.0.1'. activeDirectory.ldap_port.label=Active Directory server port activeDirectory.ldap_port.hint=The default is '389'. activeDirectory.ldap_bind_DN.label=Active Directory login matching activeDirectory.ldap_bind_DN.hint=Leave empty for anonymous access, otherwise specify full dn. E.g: cn=admin,dc=example,dc=com. activeDirectory.ldap_bind_pass.label=Active Directory password matching activeDirectory.ldap_bind_pass.hint=The password used in combination with Active Directory login matching. activeDirectory.ldap_user_group.label=Restrict to group activeDirectory.ldap_user_group.hint=Only the members of the following Active Directory group can authenticate. If you leave empty, all the users from the Base DN will be verified. E.g.: cn=developers,ou=groups,o=XWiki,c=FR. activeDirectory.ldap_exclude_group.label=Active Directory group to exclude activeDirectory.ldap_exclude_group.hint=The users that are member of the following group can't authenticate. E.g.: cn=designers,ou=groups,o=XWiki,c=FR. activeDirectory.ldap_base_DN.label=Active Directory Base DN activeDirectory.ldap_base_DN.hint=The Base DN is the root of the tree where the server performs the search. E.g: dc=example,dc=com. activeDirectory.ldap_UID_attr.label=Active Directory UID attribute name activeDirectory.ldap_UID_attr.hint=Specifies the Active Directory attribute containing the identifier to be used as the XWiki user name. The default is 'cn'. activeDirectory.ldap_trylocal.label=Try local login activeDirectory.ldap_trylocal.hint=If Active Directory authentication fails for any reason, try XWiki DB authentication with the same credentials. The default is 'yes'. activeDirectory.ldap_update_user.label=Update user from Active Directory after login activeDirectory.ldap_update_user.hint=If 'Yes', update the mapped attributes from Active Directory to XWiki on every login, else the mapping will be updated only when the user is created. The default is 'yes'. activeDirectory.ldap_update_photo.label=Update user photo from LDAP activeDirectory.ldap_update_photo.hint=If 'Yes', the XWiki avatar will be synchronized with the Active Directory on every login, else the photo will not be updated. The default in 'no'. activeDirectory.ldap_photo_attachment_name.label=Attachment name used to save the Active Directory photo activeDirectory.ldap_photo_attachment_name.hint=The Active Directory photo name that will be used in XWiki profile. activeDirectory.ldap_photo_attribute.label=Active Directory photo attribute name activeDirectory.ldap_photo_attribute.hint=Specifies the Active Directory attribute that contains the photo image. activeDirectory.ldap_fields_mapping.label=Active Directory user fields mapping activeDirectory.ldap_fields_mapping.hint=Map an Active Directory user field to a XWiki user property. E.g.: first_name->givenName. activeDirectory.ldap_group_mapping.label=Active Directory groups mapping activeDirectory.ldap_group_mapping.hint=Map an Active Directory group to a XWiki group. E.g.: XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup->cn=marketing,ou=groups,dc=example. activeDirectory.ldap_groupcache_expiration.label=Active Directory groups cache expiration activeDirectory.ldap_groupcache_expiration.hint=Time in seconds after which the list of members in a group is refreshed from Active Directory. The default is 21600 (6 hours). activeDirectory.ldap_mode_group_sync.label=When to synchronize the Active Directory groups activeDirectory.ldap_mode_group_sync.hint=The groups will be syncronized by default on every authentication of a user. activeDirectory.ldap_mode_group_sync_always=At each authentication of a user activeDirectory.ldap_mode_group_sync_create=Upon creation of a user
